string.message_spell_learning_bad_reference: [Spell Learning] Error learning spell,  removing entry from list.
string.notification_unknown_spell: [Spell Learning] Unknown spell in learning list - other spell mod removed?
string.notification_learn_spell: It all makes sense now! Learned {0}.
string.notification_slept_too_soon: It seems your mind isn't settled enough yet to learn any spells...
string.notification_moving_on: Not making any progress on {0}... trying other spells.
string.notification_impossible_spell: {0} is too difficult. Trying other spells first.
string.notification_dreamt_Julianos: You dreamt that Julianos was watching over you.
string.notification_dreamt_flying: You dreamt that you were flying over Solstheim.
string.notification_dreamt_exam: You had a nightmare about being lost forever in a plane of Oblivion.
string.notification_no_more_dreadmilk_addiction: You're finally starting to feel your dreadmilk craving wane.
string.notification_need_dreadmilk: You feel an excruciating yearning for dreadmilk...
string.notification_dreadmilk_out_of_system: All the Dreadmilk is finally out of your system...
string.notification_new_spell_idea: An idea for a new spell came to you in a dream: {0}
string.dreadmilk_feels good: Your withdrawal symptoms are relieved - for now...
string.dreadmilk_need more: You feel an excruciating yearning for more Dreadmilk...
string.mcm_current_sleep_now: You can sleep now to try learning!
string.mcm_current_sleep_1h: You can sleep in 1h to try learning.
string.mcm_current_sleep_Xh: You can sleep in {0}h to try learning.
string.mcm_option_limit_failure_always_succeeds: Auto Succeed When Max Failures Reached
string.mcm_option_auto_failure_diff: Max Skill Difference Before Auto Fail
string.mcm_option_auto_success_diff: Req. Skill Difference for Auto Success
string.mcm_message_fiss_wait: Please wait until the next message box. Do not quit this MCM menu yet.
string.mcm_message_fiss_done: Done. You are free to leave this MCM menu.
string.hint_minChanceStudy: Minimum chance per night to learn a spell from books. Default 20.
string.hint_maxChanceStudy: Maximum chance per night to learn a spell from books. Default 80.
string.hint_minChanceDiscover: Minimum chance per night to discover a new spell, adding it to the study list without the need for a book. Default 0.
string.hint_maxChanceDiscover: Maximum chance per night to discover a new spell, adding it to the study list without the need for a book. Default 10.
string.hint_maxConsecutiveFailures: Maximum consecutive failures before automatically succeeding. Default 3. Set to 0 for unlimited failures. Not recommended for use with option to learn multiple spells at once - script counts only total failures, not per-spell. Defaults to 3.
string.hint_autoNoviceLearning: Required skill difference to always succeed when learning spells. At 0, no difference is required - e.g. Apprentice Destruction means you'll never fail at learning Apprentice and Novice spells. At 25, an Apprentice of Destruction will only never fail at learning Novice spells. Defaults to 50.
string.hint_noviceLearningEnabled: When enabled, the difference between your skill in a school and the level of the spell you're trying to learn can result in an automatic success. The required difference to ensure this success is configurable below. Defaults to on.
string.hint_autoSuccessBypassesLimit: Spells learned via the above option do not count towards the daily limit. Default off. This can result in learning many spells per sleep.
string.hint_dreadstareLethality: The chance to be killed when consuming Dreadmilk while addicted. Shadowmilk is 1/4 as lethal. Default is 10%. Also increases by your bloodstream toxicity,  which increases 10% every time you consume Dreadmilk and decreases with rest.
string.hint_parallelLearning: Choose how many spells from the top of your list you will attempt to learn on each sleep. Keep in mind that when combined with drugs and a high max learning chance,  learning multiple per sleep is overpowered. 1 is default.
string.hint_harderParallel: When learning multiple spells at once, divide the chance to learn by the amount of spells being learned to help preserve a similar speed. Recommended. Has no effect when learning 1 spell per sleep. Defaults to on.
string.hint_bonusScale: Multiplier applied to the roleplaying bonus to chance of learning/discovering. This means casting spells relevant to your study, hoarding relevant spell notes,  sleeping at the College and temples,  consuming shadowmilk,  etc. Default is 1.0. Raising this can make it unreasonably easy to learn spells.
string.hint_infoStudy: Current chance to learn a spell from books (rolled after next night). Cast spells of the same school to improve. (Displays 0 if study list is empty.)
string.hint_infoDiscover: Current chance to discover a new spell and add it to the study list on an eligible rest. Cast spells of your current school of interest, use potions, or collect more notes to improve.
string.hint_collectNotes: Whether or not to deconstruct removed books into scraps. Keeping a large collection of spell notes improves the roleplaying bonus for spell learning chance. Scraps are equal in value to the book. Default is enabled.
string.hint_removeBooks: Whether or not to remove spell books from inventory when added, to prevent vanilla 'insta-learn'. Default is enabled. Disabling this may cause errors if the mod tries to teach you a spell you learn with a second book.
string.hint_preferedSchool: Set this to the school of magic you want to discover spells from. Default is Automatic, which uses your most cast school from that day.
string.hint_effortScaling: The way effort scales when rolling for successful learning. Default is Tough Start, which is harsher to those with poorer magical skills and less roleplaying bonus.
string.hint_export: Export/backup spell study list to FISS XML.
string.hint_import: Import/restore spell study list from FISS XML.
string.hint_customLocation: Click to mark the current location as your personal study. It will provide a learning bonus similar to temples,  but not as much as the College. Click again to unset.
string.hint_studyInterval: How many days must pass between learning attempts on sleep. Default is 0.65.
string.hint_enthir: Whether or not Enthir will keep a stock of items related to this mod. Default is yes.
string.hint_studyInterval: Whether or not items are added to loot lists, causing them to spawn in random merchants and as loot. Defaults to no. Cannot be easily undone.
string.hint_tooDifficultDiff: The difference in skill tier required to automatically fail learning. Default is 75 - a novice will automatically fail to learn expert+ level spells.
string.hint_tooDiffEnabled: When enabled,  you can automatically fail to learn a spell if it's significantly above your current skill level. In this case you will automatically move to the next possible spell without penalty.
string.hint_deletionWarning: WARNING: Disabling mod will clear your spell list! Use backups!
string.hint_potionBypass: When enabled,  Dreadmilk will bypass enabled skill requirements. For example, with dreadmilk a novice can attempt to learn a Master spell even when they would otherwise be prevented from doing so. Defaults to on.
string.hint_cdrEnabled: When enabling this,  casting spells etc will not only increase your chance to learn spells,  but will also reduce the cooldown between learnings. Defaults to on.
string.hint_cdr: The maximum percentage by which the cooldown can be reduced through practice by casting up to 100 spells. Defaults to 25%.
string.hint_maxFailsSucceeds: When enabled,  reaching the maximum failure limit will cause you to succeed as long as it isn't prevented by something like the skill difference option. When off, the spell will be moved to the bottom of your list instead. Defaults to on.
string.hint_dynamicDiff: When enabled,  the chance to learn a spell also depends on its own difficulty relative to your skill. Defaults to on.
string.hint_moveto_top: Moves the selected spell to the top of the list.
string.hint_moveto_bottom: Moves the selected spell to the bottom of the list.
string.hint_moveto_index: You can move the selected spell to any index that you choose.
string.hint_spell_commands: Select a command from list to execute on selected spell. Please don't misclick. These commands are not reversible.
string.notification_cannot_attune: You've attuned to a new environment too recently.
string.notification_already_attuned: You've already attuned to this environment.
string.notification_dreadmilk_feels_bad_man: You feel a little better, but it's not enough...
string.notification_spirit_summon only at midni: The ritual only has effect around midnight...
string.notification_spirit_glimpsed: The dark whispers give a glimpse of the unfathomable...
string.notification_spirit_need_more_sudden: You suddenly feel an excruciating yearning for Dreadmilk...
